DESCRIPTION: Arcane spells tend to have assorted, beneficial effects.
Frost spells revolve around crowd control and #yFreeze.
Fire spells generally deal high damage and may inflict #yBurning.

A debuff that stacks up to #b3. NL At #b1 stack, the affected creature's attacks deal #b25% less damage. NL At #b2 stacks, the affected creature receives #b25% more damage from attacks. NL At #b3 stacks, the affected creature becomes completely frozen and may not act for one turn. NL Removed if #yBurning is applied to the same creature.
Increases damage and block of certain cards. May also enhance other effects depending on the card.
#yBurning creatures will lose HP at the end of their turn. NL Removed if #yFrozen is applied to the same creature.
Removed until end of combat. NL Does NOT go to your exhaust pile.
This card automatically plays itself when drawn.
Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
Choose 1 of 3 cards to add into your hand.
